21-0199.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday,February 9, 2021.Page 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, MARCH 9, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Price, seconded by Commissioner Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 11 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Hudson, Tanzer, Saro and Zendejas2.

21-0200.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for December 2020.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 11 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Saro, Zendejas, Hudson and Tanzer3.

21-0201.summary: Recommendation to conduct a public hearing to review the proposed revision of the Housing Authority Annual Plan (2020-2021) and Five-Year Plan (2020-2025) (Plans), receive supporting documentation into the record, and conclude the public hearing; adopt resolution to certify the revised Plans, and authorize Deputy Executive Director to transmit the Plans to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD).  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Saro, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 01-21.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 11 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Saro, Zendejas, Hudson and TanzerEnactment No: H.A. 01-214.
